\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.archivetable.postfix}
\label{configuration:DatabaseArchivetablePostfix}
\ClearAPI
The postfix the name of a table used to archive objects has to end with. Valid values are all strings of chars which can be used in database table names, default value is empty. If neither postfix nor prefix (\ref{configuration:DatabaseArchivetablePrefix}) is given the postfix is set to "\_ARC".

\end{longtable}
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.DatabaseArchiveTablePostfix}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.archivetable.postfix}}]
database.archivetable.postfix=\_ARC
\end{lstlisting}
